metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22942 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A possible open redirect vulnerability in the Host Authorization middlewarein Action Pack >= 6.0.0 that could allow attackers to redirect users to amalicious website.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
